Title: The Odyssey
Actors: Armand Assante, Greta Scacchi, Isabella Rossellini, Bernadette Peters
Plot: This lavish small-screen adaptation of Homer's ancient epic--replete with Maltese and Turkish locations, state-of-the-art special effects, and many bronzed muscles gleaming with sweat--chronicles the voyage home of a Trojan hero, Odysseus King of Ithaca, and includes many more scenes of his faithful, beautiful wife Penelope dodging leering suitors at home than Homer ever composed!
Country: UK, Italy, Germany, USA, Turkey, South Africa
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 3 wins & 24 nominations.
